original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.Score<=14 AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-06-25 13:05:06' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2009-02-02 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-08-04 08:50:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-02 02:51:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= -1 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 14
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-04 08:50:31' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-02 02:51:22'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E6.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-06-25 13:05:06'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E6E5.Id=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2009-02-02 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E6E5E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E5E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E6E5E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E6E5E3E4.Id)
